content.text: Argai Minor, also known as Argai, was a planet in the Colonies region of the galaxy.

Outbound Flight and The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia places Argai in Haldeen sector. These contradict all other sources, which place Argai in the Tion Cluster in the Outer Rim Territories. This was corrected in the The Essential Atlas which creates Argai Minor and places it the Haldeen sector.
